alert.note: Alert for Burt; Colfax; Cuming; Dodge; Platte; Stanton; Thurston (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 06 at 3:11AM CDT until April 07 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 7 PM CDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the first Wind Advisory, northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. For the second Wind Advisory, northwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...In Nebraska, Thurston, Stanton, Cuming, Burt, Platte, Colfax and Dodge Counties. In Iowa, Monona County. * WHEN...For the first Wind Advisory, from 7 AM this morning to 7 PM CDT this evening. For the second Wind Advisory, from 1 AM to 7 PM CDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Burt; Colfax; Cuming; Dodge; Platte; Stanton; Thurston
